list-item.p: If non-operative treatment fails to control the pain associated with DIP joint osteoarthritis, what are the surgical alternatives?
What is the approximate range of movement achieved following DIP joint arthroplasty, as quoted in the literature?
To date, what has been the standard technique of DIP joint arthroplasty, with respect to the fate of the extensor tendon?
How does the pronation movement arm and strength of brachioradialis change from full supination to neutral forearm rotation?
How does a transfer of brachioradialis via a dorsal route through the interosseus membrane change the mechanics of brachioradialis?

Which type of revascularisation technique can be used for avulsion type ring finger amputations?
end to end arterial repair
artery transfer from the adjacent finger
venous graft
all can be used
What is the most significant complication of Neurolac® nerve guide in hand nerve defect reconstruction?
